unit.creator: Philodemus || Avdoulou, Eleni
unit.title: Index Pythagoreorum || Fr. 29 PHerc. 1508 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ⌈α̣να⌉ Crönert: ]ι (α, λ) P 2 ⌈ε̣ν⌉ Crönert: ]ε dext. inf. vest. Ρ ρ[ (ν, μ) 3 ⌈π̣ρ⌉ Crönert: ⌉ο[ dext. sup. horiz., (π, γ) P 4 ⌈τηλη⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 5 ⌈ο̣μ̣α̣ιν̣⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 6 ⌈ωνξενω̣⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 7 ⌈κραγαντ⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 8 ⌈ξενοι⌉ Crönert: [Ρ]
